key_risks: Market volatility and cyclicality in the container shipping industry
Customer concentration risk with reliance on a small number of major liner companies
Geopolitical risks including trade tensions and conflicts
Legal disputes over a deadly fire on a container ship
controversies: Complex legal battle in a U.S. federal court over a deadly fire on a container ship
environmental_issues: Pressure to comply with stricter International Maritime Organization (IMO) regulations on emissions and sustainability
Higher operational costs due to environmental compliance
social_issues: Focus on labor rights, human dignity, and occupational health and safety
Allocation of 1% of net income to reward employees contributing to environmental targets
governance_issues: Integration of risk management into business strategy
Climate-related targets tied to executive remuneration
